b) Exact approach
Thevinin Equivalent Circuit

- $R_{th} = R_1||R_2$

![](t4-4-img/r-thevenin.png){#fig-r-thevenin align=center width=300 alt="r-thevenin.png"}

- $V_{th} = V_{R_2} = V_{CC} \times \frac{R_2}{R_1+R_2}$

![](t4-4-img/v-thevenin.png){#fig-v-thevenin align=center width=300 alt="v-thevenin.png"}

![](t4-4-img/thevenin-circuit.png){#fig-thevenin-circuit align=center width=300 alt="thevenin-circuit.png"}

In the B-E loop of @fig-thevenin-circuit:

$$V_{th} - I_B R_{th} - V_{BE} - V_{RE} = 0$$

$$V_{th} - I_B R_{th} - V_{BE} - I_E R_E = 0$$

$$V_{th} - I_B R_{th} - V_{BE} - I_B (1+\beta_{DC}) R_E = 0$$

$$I_B = \frac{V_{th} - V_{BE}}{R_{th} + (1+\beta_{DC}) R_E}$$
